problem.markdown:
>>All of the following are energy sources that are indirectly derived from the Sun EXCEPT:<< () coal () natural gas (x) nuclear fission () oil () wood
[explanation] Nuclear power comes from fission - splitting of atoms. Fossil fuels are derived from plant and animal remains that were fossilized millions of years ago. Plants require energy from the Sun to grow and animals eat plants so both are derived from the Sun. [explanation]
